description: Main entry point and app configuration for a Flutter attendance tracker app, including Firebase initialization, theming, and routing.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application setting up theme and initial routes.

classes.name: SplashRouterGate
classes.description: Decides initial navigation based on user authentication state.

classes.name: AttendanceScreen
classes.description: Main screen for attendance list and navigation to reports.

classes.name: ReportsScreen
classes.description: Placeholder screen for reports and charts.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; loads environment variables, initializes Firebase, and runs app.

methods.name: _initFirebase
methods.description: Sets up Firebase with environment variables or defaults, optionally connects to emulators.

methods.name: _decide
methods.description: Determines initial route based on Firebase auth status.
